subject: Frank's Box on Paranormal State Tonight
author: rednellie
full_text:
I just ran across this episode description on A&E website:

"PRS explores the belly of the beast: a New York State Prison that was 
once a mental asylum. Ryan and his team go behind bars to uncover the 
institution's paranormal past and present--current inmates and guards 
are reporting mysterious new sightings! For their biggest case yet PRS 
enlists the help of  psychic Chip Coffey, demonologist Lorraine Warren 
and Chris Moon, the owner/inventor of the latest in paranormal 
technology, "Frank's Box," a radio designed to communicate with the dead"

I think they have their details a bit wrong.  :-P


Nellie
